column4: Hi...Kust instaled Virtualbox 4.1.18 in Fedora 17. I created a VM for Windows XP n when I started it,It gave an error : "Kernel driver not installed (rc=-1908)" It asked me to run '/etc/init.d/vboxdrv setup' as root..After I ran it, This is the error in LOG file @ /var/log/vbox-install.log " http://pastebin.com/ztryWknj " .Please help me with it..
